.bad-outcome-title.2: This is not Medical Advice! Consult Your Local Doctor For Accurate Medical Diagnosis.

.bad-next-steps.1: 1. Immediately call the National Helpline +91-11-23978046 for help.
.bad-next-steps.2: 2. Regularly and thoroughly clean your hands with an alcoholbased hand rub or wash them with soap and water.
.bad-next-steps.3: 3. Maintain at least 1 metre (3 feet) distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing or sneezing.
.bad-next-steps.4: 4. Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

.good-outcome-title.1: This is not Medical Advice! Consult Your Local Doctor For Accurate Medical Diagnosis.

.good-next-steps.1: 1. Regularly and thoroughly clean your hands with an alcoholbased hand rub or wash them with soap and water.
.good-next-steps.2: 2. Maintain at least 1 metre (3 feet) distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing or sneezing.
.good-next-steps.3: 3. Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.
.good-next-steps.4: 4. Visit the Official Ministry Website COVID-19 MyGov for More Information.
